title: The app/website is giving me a Connectivity/Something is not right here error. Help! : BookMyShow Support Centre
category: Ticket Booking Queries : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
Oops! We see network glitch has crossed your path and interrupted the excitement.
Nonetheless, we our on our toes to provide you a seamless experience and this may get fixed in a while hence we urge you to book your tickets from an alternate cinema.
If this is your favorite place, keep your fingers cross and do book your tickets after a while.
